info.title: Alpha Vantage API
info.description: This is an API specification for the Alpha Vantage API, which provides various financial data.

parameters.name: function
parameters.description: The function to be performed by the API

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The symbol of the equity you're interested in

parameters.name: horizon
parameters.description: The time horizon for the EARNINGS_CALENDAR function

parameters.name: tickers
parameters.description: The stock/crypto/forex symbols of your choice.

parameters.name: topics
parameters.description: The news topics of your choice.

parameters.name: time_from
parameters.description: The start time of the news articles you are targeting, in YYYYMMDDTHHMM format.

parameters.name: time_to
parameters.description: The end time of the news articles you are targeting, in YYYYMMDDTHHMM format.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sort order of the news articles. By default, sort=LATEST. You can also set sort=EARLIEST or sort=RELEVANCE based on your use case.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of matching results to return. By default, limit=50. You can also set limit=200 to output up to 200 results.
